source.name: Q2
source.instructions:
In you EKS cluster, a specific pod requires access to a AWS Secret Manager, and an engineer assigned the necessary permissions directly to the node group role.

What potential risks may arise from this approach?

answers.answer: The pod might experience latency issues when accessing the Secret Manager.
Unauthorized pods in the same node group could potentially access the Secret Manager.
The engineer should have assigned permissions directly to the Deployment, bypassing the node group role.
